subject: p13352405
History: Right pleural effusion after VATS decortication.
Impression: PA and lateral chest compared to : Large right pleural effusion persists following removal of the right pleural drain. There is no appreciable pneumothorax. Large fissural fluid collection should not be mistaken for right lung mass. Left lung is grossly clear. Heart size normal.
